definition: to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: You can give a late-term abortion with just acupuncture.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過鍼灸來晚期流產。

sentences.english: Gefitinib may harm the fetus and increase the risk of pregnancy loss.
sentences.chinese: 吉非替尼可能危害胎兒及提高流產的風險。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical effect of miscarriage prevention of notifying kidney and spleen on threatened abortion.
sentences.chinese: 觀察用補腎健脾安胎法治療先兆流產的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: On one occasion, I was given the task of baptizing an aborted child that did not make it through labor.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，我的任務是孩子流產了洗禮，不靠勞教人員。

sentences.english: But I think it's limiting that it's only OK to talk about miscarriages if you're sad about it.
sentences.chinese: 但是我認爲談論流產的時候只能傷心是個限制。

sentences.english: Objective: To know about demands of threatened abortion patients toward health education.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解先兆流產病人的健康教育需求。

sentences.english: Result showed that anomalous chromosome is one cause of recurrent abortion.
sentences.chinese: 說明了染色體異常是導致反覆性流產的原因之一。

sentences.english: Thus did the foetus of crime engendered by Brujon in La Force miscarry .
sentences.chinese: 普呂戎在拉弗爾斯監獄裏製造的罪胎就這樣流產了。

sentences.english: Sometimes, an abortionist fails to evacuate the placenta from the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 通常，流產者在從子宮中娩出胎盤時會失敗。

sentences.english: Ideals be damned for the President who vetoed the ban on partial-birth abortions.
sentences.chinese: 總統否決成型胎兒流產禁令纔是其受反對的原因。

sentences.english: So this kind of anesthesia method is applicable completely to the policlinic induced abortion operations.
sentences.chinese: 所以這種麻醉方法適用於門診人工流產手術。

sentences.english: ObjectiveExplore the curative effect and mechanism of threatened abortion treated with anti-abortion and nourish-blood decoction(AND).
sentences.chinese: 探討安胎養血方對先兆流產的療效及機理。

sentences.english: How would you react if your friend wanted an abortion?
sentences.chinese: 如果你的朋友要求流產的話，你會有什麼反應？

sentences.english: But the presence of Manus in the village causes the mission to be scrubbed.
sentences.chinese: 馬努在村莊裏的出現，卻使這次任務流產。

sentences.english: If you’ve made it this far it’s likely you won’t miscarry.
sentences.chinese: 如果你已經走到了現在，你就不太可能會流產了。

sentences.english: Adnexitis happen often after delivery or execute abortion in postoperative.
sentences.chinese: 附件炎的發生往往在分娩後或在施行人工流產術後。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
